scripts.firebase: yarn babel && cp server/package.json firebase/package.json && cp -r server/build firebase && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.babel: rm -rf firebase && mkdir firebase && babel server/index.js -o firebase/index.js --presets=@babel/preset-env && babel server/template.js -o firebase/template.js --presets=@babel/preset-env
scripts.build: onerror 'webpack --config webpack.prod.js --mode production --display-error-details' -t 'The build has failed' -m 'Check the console to find out what went wrong.' -s 'Submarine'
